panels.description: Does not include instances whose metrics are considered stale by Prometheus.
panels.title: Active Instances

panels.description: Includes instances whose metrics are considered stale by Prometheus, but does not always show the latest values (reason unknown).
panels.title: All Instances
Received Response Body Bytes (Per-Second Average Rate)

targets.expr:
# hits / (hits + misses)
# increase() is required to get the hits and misses that have occurred since the previous measurement (instead of all hits and misses that have ever occurred).
increase({"abwcf.lenient_robots_filter.cache.hits_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
/
(
    increase({"abwcf.lenient_robots_filter.cache.hits_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
    +
    increase({"abwcf.lenient_robots_filter.cache.misses_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.description: The number of URLs that successfully passed the filter and the number of URLs that were rejected by the filter.
panels.title: Filter Passed and Rejected

targets.expr:
# hits / (hits + misses)
# increase() is required to get the hits and misses that have occurred since the previous measurement (instead of all hits and misses that have ever occurred).
increase({"abwcf.strict_robots_filter.cache.hits_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
/
(
    increase({"abwcf.strict_robots_filter.cache.hits_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
    +
    increase({"abwcf.strict_robots_filter.cache.misses_total", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.description: The number of pages that successfully passed the filter, the number of pages that were rejected by the filter and the number of pages that were ignored due to unavailable host information.
panels.title: Filter Passed, Rejected and Ignored
